images.summary: This plan view shows the layout of a floating slab foundation. The dimensions of the slab are 18'-0" by 22'-0", as indicated by the dimension lines. The plan includes section callouts '2/S1' which refer to detailed sections of the slab. The drawing is scaled at 1/8"=1'-0" and is labeled as 'PLAN FLOATING SLAB'. The floating slab is the primary component depicted in this plan.

images.summary: This section view illustrates the thickened edge of a floating slab foundation. The section is labeled '2/S1' and is drawn at a scale of 1/2"=1'-0". Key components include a sill plate with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48 inches on center, and four 15M rebar for reinforcement. The section specifies a slope grade away at 2% and optional insulation. The foundation includes a 6mil poly vapour barrier and a minimum of 2 inches of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi. Compacted granular 'A' is used as a base, and the slab reinforcement options include 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh or a 16" x 16" 10M grid or fibre mesh. The section provides detailed construction specifications for the thickened edge of the slab.
